articles.title: All about me
articles.description: I am a B.A. Candidate in International Affairs at The George Washington University, graduating May 2021. During my studies I have focused on international politics and Middle Eastern and Northern African affairs. I also hold a working profiency in Arabic.

articles.title: Work Experience
articles.description: My professional and educational experience over the years
